Ask HN: Any outdoorsy HNers who want to do a wilderness meetup?
text:
I love wilderness hiking and overlanding all over the west, and I've got a big list of 'secret sites' I've been to that are amazing and free to camp at. Some of them are even right on rivers and allow for hours of kayaking.

When I camp with friends it's mostly hanging out, music, drinks, amazing cooking, some mind-expansion for those who are into it, etc.

If we can get a handful of people on board, I think something in October/November of this year would be very doable.

Thoughts?

title: Ask HN: Pros and Cons of Crowd Funding?
text:
Now that the SEC has changed the rules on crowdfunding, curious what people’s experiences on crowdfunding has been? Is it something worth seriously looking at, or does it cause heartache at later rounds?

In particular, seems like it might be capital relatively more easy to raise if you have a large social network.

Thoughts?

Show HN: VoxelChain – Create Interactive Voxel Worlds in the Browser
text:
Hi everyone! I've been working on this project for quite a while now and finally came to the point of releasing a public version of it.

VoxelChain is a browser-based tool that allows to design voxel worlds with real-time ray traced lighting and a custom Cellular Automata based simulation engine.

PS: not my own, posting this for a friend
